afterActivityFinished().Description: Override this method to execute any code that should run after your @B_android#app#Activity_E@ is finished. This method is called after each test method, including any method annotated with

afterActivityLaunched().Description: Override this method to execute any code that should run after your @B_android#app#Activity_E@ is launched, but before any test code is run including any method annotated with Prefer

ClassDesc: This rule makes it easy to use Espresso-Intents APIs in functional UI tests. This class is an extension of @B_android#support#test#rule#ActivityTestRule_E@, which initializes Espresso-Intents before each test annotated with @B_android#support#test#rule#ActivityTestRule_E@. Espresso-Intents APIs can be used in two ways: Intent Verification, using the @B_android#support#test#espresso#intent#Intents#intended_E@ API Intent Stubbing, using the @B_android#support#test#espresso#intent#Intents#intending_E@ API
